catalog_script_client.name: Set Site/Location/Address on Options

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_23c9592c1bd63dd0824752c1604bcb72
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Telco Request">670690da1bf5f110824752c1604bcbe7</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:44175a44db96f1d040eae46b1396196d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set Site/Location/Address on Options</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	if (newValue == 'designated_site') {
		// disable location and set address fields to r/o
		g_form.setMandatory('site', true);
		g_form.setDisplay('site', true);
		g_form.setDisplay('location', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('location', true);
		g_form.setMandatory('location', false);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_county', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_street', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_city', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_state', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_zip', true);
	}
	if (newValue == 'designated_location') {
		// disable site and set address fields to r/o
		g_form.setDisplay('location', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('location', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('location', true);
		g_form.setMandatory('site', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('site', false);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_county', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_street', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_city', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_state', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_zip', true);
	}
	if (newValue == 'site_location_does_not_exist') {
		// disable site/location and set address fields to editable
		g_form.setMandatory('location', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('site', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('location', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('site', false);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_county', false);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_street', false);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_city', false);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_state', false);
		g_form.setReadOnly('dest_zip', false);
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wbbusby</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-01 00:27:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>23c9592c1bd63dd0824752c1604bcb72</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Site/Location/Address on Options</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NS Pro" source="x_g_sonc_ns_pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NS Pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_23c9592c1bd63dd0824752c1604bcb72</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>wbbusby</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-01 07:47:34</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
